title: Kelly Brook exposes her sexy hourglass figure as she shares NAKED bath-time snap
text:
Kelly Brook exposes her sexy hourglass figure as she shares NAKED bath-time snap Kelly Brook exposes her sexy hourglass figure as she shares NAKED bath-time snap KELLY BROOK flaunted her hourglass figure in all of its glory as she shared a snap of herself slipping into the bathtub earlier today. PUBLISHED: 07:45,   08:01, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 INSTAGRAM Kelly Brook treated fans to a naked Instagram snap earlier today 
The 37-year-old model teased fans with a nude snap that saw her looking out over New York City, where she is currently enjoying a romantic break with boyfriend Jeremy Parisi. 
Setting pulses racing, the beauty pulled her trademark brunette tresses into an easy top knot and exposed her naked body as she revelled in a soak with a view. 
Making sure she didn’t flash too much, Kelly’s saucy snap ended at the very top of her ample derriere. Related articles
